a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

li.a: Del Norte County Office of Education

p.span: Information regarding the Coronavirus pandemic continues to change rapidly. Here are some of the latest updates we have available regarding meal access. Please check in frequently as information is being added regularly.

Here you can find "Curbside Pickup" and "Bused Drop Off" locations for seamless meals program during the current school closure. Meals will be provided for all children ages 0-18 regardless of their enrollment in the district. Meal packs will include lunches for the current day and breakfast for the following day. If you have any questions call Nutrition Services at 464-0246.
